full_summary:
### Earned Value Management Services for the National Shipbuilding Strategy

#### Tender Notice
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01005095
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** EN578-222504/B
**Publication Date:** 2022-08-23
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-06T14:00:00

#### Notice Type
This is a REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) conduct under AN Open Competitive Bidding process.

#### Requirement
Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPC) requires analytical services from an independent third-party expert to support the development of quality Earned Value Management System information. The resulting analyses will be used to support informed decision-making by various stakeholders within the federal government by demonstrating the level of effort and pricing quoted by shipyards for specific items are fair and reasonable.

#### Solicitation Documents
The solicitation document contains the detailed requirements of the tender.

#### Security Requirement
A security clearance is required for the work contained within the scope of this procurement.

#### Duration of the Contract
The duration of the contract is from the date of contract award to March 31, 2025. The contract also has options to extend the period of services for up to an additional 7 years, to be exercised at Canada’s discretion.

#### Enquiries
Enquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be submitted in writing to the following:

* Jason Kwan
* Supply Team Leader, Defence and Marine Strategic Program Management
* Public Services and Procurement Canada
* 270 Albert Street
* Ottawa ON K1P 6E6
* Email: Jason.Kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Telephone: 613-415-7797
